name: About the Light
description:
Action-rpg Openworld Adventure, set in a world shrouded in darkness.

Explore the lands of Asdrasil and create the Fundamental Element that holds the balance of the world to defeat the darkness.

Rallen is the last remaining alchemist of the cult of the Black Sun, an ancient order that fights against the darkness controlled by the ancestral being Baalith.

Too many years have passed since the last cycle of the Black Sun, the now extinct alchemists cannot preserve the light and the darkness of Baalith has embraced the world, corroding the souls of the creatures who live in the lands of Asdrasil.

  • Explore the dungeons of the lands of Asdrasil
  • Gather materials and craft weapons and armor to defend yourself against corrupted creatures
  • Learn magic of the Black Sun cult
  • Craft items and get ready for adventure
  • Meet the survivors from the darkness in the dying lands of Asdrasil
  • Customize Rallen and decide whether to be an Alchemist Mage or Warrior

The game is still in development, please if you find any bugs or do not hesitate to report them.

Currently in version 0.2.0 there are 2 open areas, 3 dungeons, 5 Bosses.
